channel.title: Arthion Project
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/9804/arthion.png[/img]
This is a project and you can play it well its under devlopment Okay the server is 90% like BattleScape Isle. it will be update daily and we re still going to add more stuff. The Xp is like 140x not sure i don't remember what i set it too. [B][U]- Client Download -[/U][/B] Uppit - *link removed
[SIZE="5"][B][U]Server Features[/U][/B][/SIZE] - Pest Control - Great Pking - KQ - Daggnoth's - Dueling - Warrior's Guild - Great Uptime - Lunar Magic's - New emote's and more to come - Some of the Wild Island is multi - Barrow's - Much Much more.
[U][B]Media[/B][/U] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zvyqb5plUoI]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zvyqb5plUoI[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZHGuzdQDa6k]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZHGuzdQDa6k[/url]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/13z71xt.jpg[/img]
[B][U]Good Ol' Times[/U][/B]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Arthion Project
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

No development of any type being shown, you’re basically advertising by posting a download for the client connecting to the server.
